name: Nightmares of War
description:
Nightmares of War is a shmup made for the GMTK Jam 2020, with a gimmick of having your projectile ricochet whenever you shot at a wall, enforcing the player to plan ahead its shots, otherwise things are going to get out of control...

Controls:

arrows/WASD: move

space/E: shoot

Credits:

Music/SFX: Felipe Oliveira

Art: Barbara Ueki

Programmer: Vagner Seibert
